item.title: About
item.description: Heye it’s me Fahim Fuad. You know me, else you wouldn’t be here. Everyday I wake up, do what I can and capable to do, watch Facebook reels and write shits here, sleep and repeat. Pretty cringe, right? So here is my life(a joke) to make your vist to this website a fruitful investment of your time & life: Joke
